body:
Hi Chris,



If possible, can you check if my replacement hack for radiation was correct? It just might be that I missed out on something there... The gh file containing that component can be found here: [https://www.dropbox.com/sh/t2o10lilig7rn9u/AAC7MYwvxdSrGRyxunmMJC4-...](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/t2o10lilig7rn9u/AAC7MYwvxdSrGRyxunmMJC4-a?dl=0).

The initial epw data that I used was for state College and the replacement weather data was taken from weatherFile.csv (which Mike posted here).



Sarith
